Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I tried using this, only to see the hdmi output I was using went to ONE cable. That is NOT what I wanted! I wanted it to split the video to two different cables! Not one.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: ADE
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work at all. It feels cheap and empty. Waste of money. I wouldn't give it one star but I have to.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Garza
Reviews.Content: it work just perfect for the price is it a deal i real pleased everything it works out thanks i recommended

Reviews.Title: poor device
Reviews.Author: Garland Hughes
Reviews.Content: Switch does not perform as advertised.  Unit must be unplugged each time you change input devices.  I purchased this device because I only had 1 empty HDMI input and 2 devices (a Samsung blueray player and a Chrome cast) the switch must be unplugged every time you switch input devices in order for it to read the signal from the input device.

Reviews.Title: Nice product for the money.
Reviews.Author: Kev-IAJF
Reviews.Content: I'm now able to share one HDMI port between three different items with ease.  Simple to use and more than worth the price.  I would certainly recommend one of these to anyone needing additional HDMI ports.

Reviews.Title: Works just as described
Reviews.Author: M & N "mnp"
Reviews.Content: We have a small TV in a rec room and it has only one HDMI port.  This solves the problem.

Reviews.Title: excellent product at a good price!
Reviews.Author: cesar Lopez
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! I got what I really wait. This has three outputs where you can connect three devices to your tv. Good choice.

Reviews.Title: Clear Picture and Sound - and Cheap
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Does what it is supposed to do. The picture is very clear and the sound is great! Switching between units is real easy...just push the button. Solidly built. No complaints.

ProductInfo.Features:
3 Port AUTO 1 out HDMI SWITCH
Support 12-bit Deep Color full 1080p
Connect the HDMI output from the Selector Switch to an HDTV or other high-definition displays. Be sure to use a quality HDMI Cable to connect all of your HD components to this switcher.
This switch is operated off of the power provided in the HDMI signal and requires no additional power supply. By use of the Select push button you are able to switch between devices with ease.
Multifunctional on switching: intelligent or mechanical
ProductInfo.Name: Generic 3 Port AUTO HDMI SWITCH SWITCHER SPLITTER HUB HD 1080p Cable Support 3D Color Black
